Headline: No trains between 54th/Cermak and Central Park
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Central Park due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Central Park due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between Central Park and the Loop 'L'  at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Central Park and 54th/Cermak to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#21 Cermak

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
